61b89db630a932d03db6d76dabca61a6.name: ARCO
61b89db630a932d03db6d76dabca61a6.description: Módulo para registrar las incidencias de Acceso, Rectificación, Cancelación y Oposición para cumplir con la LOPD.
61b89db630a932d03db6d76dabca61a6.author: JPL TSolucio, S.L.

9d479be6b61c671b9bf2b79013014db5.name: Follow Record
9d479be6b61c671b9bf2b79013014db5.description: Module that permits following changes on any record for any user. This module will send notifications to all users subscribed to a record.
9d479be6b61c671b9bf2b79013014db5.author: Joe Bordes

d51886e9ff11c8667ddda0973c2757e8.name: Adequacy
d51886e9ff11c8667ddda0973c2757e8.description: This project-like module is part of the Adequacy functionality. It represents the actual implementation process in the company designated by the flow and steps and controls the status of implementation of the adequacy project.
d51886e9ff11c8667ddda0973c2757e8.author: JPL TSolucio, S.L.

12aa7ec7dc065b42e95f120c0117dcb5.name: Affiliates
12aa7ec7dc065b42e95f120c0117dcb5.description: Contact like module created to track people who in one form or another endorse our company and are directly related to it.
12aa7ec7dc065b42e95f120c0117dcb5.author: JPL TSolucio, S.L.

15562975a6c0a6041a98207e6a6a7127.name: Applications
15562975a6c0a6041a98207e6a6a7127.description: This asset-like module records all the software applications and appliances we have in our company. Ideal for inventory, license control and renewals.
15562975a6c0a6041a98207e6a6a7127.author: JPL TSolucio, S.L.

08665afb9b9dddaf7f798c52fb269b63.name: Attorneys
08665afb9b9dddaf7f798c52fb269b63.description: Contact-like module to register information about the Attorneys in our office. This is part of **Attorney's Back Office**.
08665afb9b9dddaf7f798c52fb269b63.author: JPL TSolucio, S.L.

711150248459d8f8fa64a9f600c6d8a2.name: Auto Increment Number Field
711150248459d8f8fa64a9f600c6d8a2.description: This configuration module permits you to define different increment counters with a prefix for fields in modules and then apply them with conditions using workflows. It will permit you to have various counter/increment fields on any module or increment differently the same field depending on values in the record being saved.
711150248459d8f8fa64a9f600c6d8a2.author: JPL TSolucio, S.L.

174c585788f36e6aa13d4f88fde9f51e.name: Bank Accounts
174c585788f36e6aa13d4f88fde9f51e.description: Bank Accounts module to register information about the bank accounts you work with, either your company or your clients accounts. This module is related with the Bank module and should be installed together. This is part of the **payments extensions** that support **SEPA and direct bank charges** to your clients.
174c585788f36e6aa13d4f88fde9f51e.author: JPL TSolucio, S.L.

80e010ba7e2faf24c6ece014afa84071.name: Banks
80e010ba7e2faf24c6ece014afa84071.description: Bank module to register information of the banks you work with. This is part of the **payments extensions** that support **SEPA and direct bank charges** to your clients.
80e010ba7e2faf24c6ece014afa84071.author: JPL TSolucio, S.L.

04d33432e6586aa725773897c646d62e.name: Access Registration Module
04d33432e6586aa725773897c646d62e.description: This module records all access different people do upon certain assets. Necessary for inventory knowledge and legal requirements.
04d33432e6586aa725773897c646d62e.author: JPL TSolucio, S.L.

5a98bef1ee218c8c1b1bb13ddbcce1e8.name: Adequacy: Flow
5a98bef1ee218c8c1b1bb13ddbcce1e8.description: This module is part of the Adequacy functionality. It represents the exact sequence of steps that must be taken to achieve the implementation process in the company. The idea of this module is to permit creating as many business process flow as needed and then instantiate then using an Adequacy. A business flow is an exact sequence of business steps.
5a98bef1ee218c8c1b1bb13ddbcce1e8.author: JPL TSolucio, S.L.

e8a8b14fbef3ee9d0e6fd9d76475b64f.name: Adequacy: Steps
e8a8b14fbef3ee9d0e6fd9d76475b64f.description: This module is part of the Adequacy functionality. It represents a pool of steps or actions that can be done in any given adequacy project. The flow module will group these steps together into sequences to be used.
e8a8b14fbef3ee9d0e6fd9d76475b64f.author: JPL TSolucio, S.L.

c96a81e3711333dc402b58e7a289cb12.name: Attendance Details Information
c96a81e3711333dc402b58e7a289cb12.description: Module to register the fact of a contact assisting an event or session (related with cbSession module)
c96a81e3711333dc402b58e7a289cb12.author: JPL TSolucio, S.L.

1a493a6456d9f38c3bb1aeecf3d9a1ab.name: Session/Event Details Information
1a493a6456d9f38c3bb1aeecf3d9a1ab.description: Module to register the fact of a session of some event that will take place (related with cbAttendance module)
1a493a6456d9f38c3bb1aeecf3d9a1ab.author: JPL TSolucio, S.L.

5bab334fc92b103f7b18861279d6f665.name: Backup Procedure
5bab334fc92b103f7b18861279d6f665.description: This documentation-like module records all the backups systems and their responsible parties that are used in the account. Necessary for inventory knowledge and legal requirements.
5bab334fc92b103f7b18861279d6f665.author: JPL TSolucio, S.L.

7cee7fa0b4d61b773877c6b2f659c625.name: Center Type
7cee7fa0b4d61b773877c6b2f659c625.description: Picklist-like module to record work centers, offices or similar.
7cee7fa0b4d61b773877c6b2f659c625.author: JPL TSolucio, S.L.

c6ece68ea8213464fa1c8c55636ac18a.name: Commission Range
c6ece68ea8213464fa1c8c55636ac18a.description: Module to register commission ranges. This module will permit you to record a start and end number associated to a commission, which can then be used in other modules to establish payments or similar.
c6ece68ea8213464fa1c8c55636ac18a.author: JPL TSolucio, S.L.

8505063e02abcf6de967b0a3cb1bb184.name: Confidential Information
8505063e02abcf6de967b0a3cb1bb184.description: Extension to safely store sensitive information. Data will be encrypted and only accessible by users with the appropriate credentials. The goal of the module is to protect sensitive information both from unauthorized access from within the company and from anybody who could somehow get a hold of our full database, be them ill-intentioned or simply third parties that require access to support or solve problems.
8505063e02abcf6de967b0a3cb1bb184.author: JPL TSolucio, S.L.

f50a7deac1eb52e39b50012efde9c65b.name: Color and Condition Fields and Blocks
f50a7deac1eb52e39b50012efde9c65b.description: This extension permits you to establish different coloring and formatting rules for fields on a module depending on conditions based on the values of the fields in the record. You can also manipulate blocks by closing and hiding them depending on field conditions defined.
f50a7deac1eb52e39b50012efde9c65b.author: JPL TSolucio, S.L.

95a37c0924d21b23163c1295e5c2c085.name: Ingress and Expense Control
95a37c0924d21b23163c1295e5c2c085.description: An accounting type module to register incoming and outgoing money charges that happen against different records in the application.
95a37c0924d21b23163c1295e5c2c085.author: JPL TSolucio, S.L.

907d4494f6306d30caad7c94322cd2b4.name: Employee Type
907d4494f6306d30caad7c94322cd2b4.description: Picklist-like module to record different types or roles of employees
907d4494f6306d30caad7c94322cd2b4.author: JPL TSolucio, S.L.

6938b9709395931f4b2e53d64d484712.name: Equipment
6938b9709395931f4b2e53d64d484712.description: Picklist-like module to record equipment/assets, their cost and amortization.
6938b9709395931f4b2e53d64d484712.author: JPL TSolucio, S.L.

5bd80b5f4b0c8d0002d310f227db9a70.name: External Assets
5bd80b5f4b0c8d0002d310f227db9a70.description: An asset type module (really an asset clone) to register equipment and machines present in our clients installations that were not sold by us but that we are interested in controling/substituting.
5bd80b5f4b0c8d0002d310f227db9a70.author: JPL TSolucio, S.L.

20f0942d6060a5eb27b71d27e748c6b9.name: Frequency Type
20f0942d6060a5eb27b71d27e748c6b9.description: Picklist-like module to record different frequencies.
20f0942d6060a5eb27b71d27e748c6b9.author: JPL TSolucio, S.L.

981b5eabfacc1227db2444a721cb8ad3.name: coreBOS Geographic Map
981b5eabfacc1227db2444a721cb8ad3.description: An extension that will permit us to geolocalize our clients, potentials, tickets or any module with an address using Google Maps or OpenStreetMaps integration.
981b5eabfacc1227db2444a721cb8ad3.author: JPL TSolucio, S.L.

e2dd8b72482db89b88879c7c4ab41193.name: Lock Record
e2dd8b72482db89b88879c7c4ab41193.description: This extension will inform about record editing and optionally block the edit completely. When you access a record in detail view and another user in the application is editing it, you will be informed it is being edited.
e2dd8b72482db89b88879c7c4ab41193.author: JPL TSolucio, S.L.

47026d821badc1453a71ba6b55e22b94.name: Relationships
47026d821badc1453a71ba6b55e22b94.description: Module to register the relation between two accounts, contacts, vendors or leads.The module enables you to record and analyze relationships of a lead, an account or a contact for a better understanding of its roles, dependencies and influences.
47026d821badc1453a71ba6b55e22b94.author: JPL TSolucio, S.L.

f8998650fc1e4bbcd3036e3616f388c9.name: Service Type
f8998650fc1e4bbcd3036e3616f388c9.description: Picklist-like module to record service categories or types
f8998650fc1e4bbcd3036e3616f388c9.author: JPL TSolucio, S.L.

76ca3874026d767b20a2406c4989c498.name: Stake Holder Information
76ca3874026d767b20a2406c4989c498.description: Module to register the relation between accounts, contacts, vendors or leads against project or tickets. Representing their interest as stake holders on the project or ticket.
76ca3874026d767b20a2406c4989c498.author: JPL TSolucio, S.L.

e3cfeebc3cbbdeed21a9ee5760178d02.name: Training Details Information
e3cfeebc3cbbdeed21a9ee5760178d02.description: Module to record the registration of contacts to and the service price of an event that will take place (related with cbAttendance module)
e3cfeebc3cbbdeed21a9ee5760178d02.author: JPL TSolucio, S.L.

4c502e3ce29f739fee8685a32592beaa.name: Work Day Type
4c502e3ce29f739fee8685a32592beaa.description: Picklist-like module to record different categories or types of working days and their cost.
4c502e3ce29f739fee8685a32592beaa.author: JPL TSolucio, S.L.

83ba746476b7c5dcb3730fb06424cf75.name: Zone
83ba746476b7c5dcb3730fb06424cf75.description: Picklist-like module to record different zones or regions in which we wish to divde countries or similar.
83ba746476b7c5dcb3730fb06424cf75.author: JPL TSolucio, S.L.

480cade09ceb138870838cc3ea171f86.name: Cloud File
480cade09ceb138870838cc3ea171f86.description: This extension permits you to link files in different locations like Dropbox, Google Drive, Samba, Webdav or File System to any record in the application. It will only register the link to the file which will not be downloaded into coreBOS.
480cade09ceb138870838cc3ea171f86.author: JPL TSolucio, S.L.

83f302199eba9e701d4751c201199f08.name: Conversations
83f302199eba9e701d4751c201199f08.description: The Conversations module is similar to the native comments module in coreBOS but is intended to save large conversations that take place outside the application.
83f302199eba9e701d4751c201199f08.author: JPL TSolucio, S.L.

56c955aefd52893f6ed960e139165549.name: Cookies
56c955aefd52893f6ed960e139165549.description: This asset-like module records all the cookies being used by an account on their website. Necessary for inventory knowledge and legal requirements.
56c955aefd52893f6ed960e139165549.author: JPL TSolucio, S.L.

c9efb06cc5463de989e708114b9e3dbc.name: coreBOS Multi-Address
c9efb06cc5463de989e708114b9e3dbc.description: Module to manage many addresses related to Accounts and Contacts. You will be able to relate as many addresses as you need to each account/contact and then establish the default billing and shipping address on them and on each individual Quote, SalesOrder, PurchaseOrder and Invoice.
c9efb06cc5463de989e708114b9e3dbc.author: JPL TSolucio, S.L.

55edc650ea31fbbbd8e6ed3ec153c26b.name: coreBOS Import/Export Relations
55edc650ea31fbbbd8e6ed3ec153c26b.description: This extension permits exporting information about many to many relations between records from one coreBOS install to another.
55edc650ea31fbbbd8e6ed3ec153c26b.author: JPL TSolucio, S.L.

13683e9e77c936c826517a98cb6448bb.name: County
13683e9e77c936c826517a98cb6448bb.description: County module to save local region/political divisions.
13683e9e77c936c826517a98cb6448bb.author: JPL TSolucio, S.L.

5fd68f02446d5fe7067dfa27e3266df6.name: Daily Activity Report
5fd68f02446d5fe7067dfa27e3266df6.description: This extension permits you to see what changes happened in the application and by who each day.
5fd68f02446d5fe7067dfa27e3266df6.author: JPL TSolucio, S.L.

23a43955a7242a11e55a0e65c641d20e.name: Dependents
23a43955a7242a11e55a0e65c641d20e.description: Contact like module related to Contacts where you can save information about people that depend upon the main Contact
23a43955a7242a11e55a0e65c641d20e.author: JPL TSolucio, S.L.

9e484a780791f0e41c5b7504c1e85653.name: Discount on Product and Service Category
9e484a780791f0e41c5b7504c1e85653.description: This business settings module will permit you to define discounts per product/service line and/or clients.
9e484a780791f0e41c5b7504c1e85653.author: JPL TSolucio, S.L.

ca00d5d1e54b534845de34422c64bf0c.name: Equipment
ca00d5d1e54b534845de34422c64bf0c.description: This asset-like module records all computers being used by an account. Necessary for inventory knowledge and legal requirements.
ca00d5d1e54b534845de34422c64bf0c.author: JPL TSolucio, S.L.

e6a9ec1ce1285f6bbccb85e9a63554a9.name: Federal Court
e6a9ec1ce1285f6bbccb85e9a63554a9.description: Module to record US Federal Courts
e6a9ec1ce1285f6bbccb85e9a63554a9.author: JPL TSolucio, S.L.

4251388aa54241c541a31ffd7d3e0e95.name: Forecast and Budget Control
4251388aa54241c541a31ffd7d3e0e95.description: Plan a whole range of budgeting target against each Salesman / product / period based on potential Closed Won
4251388aa54241c541a31ffd7d3e0e95.author: JPL TSolucio, S.L.

6df764c29a2b4d2ad07a79f276bdb219.name: General Ledger Accounts
6df764c29a2b4d2ad07a79f276bdb219.description: General Ledger Accounts module.This is part of the Attorney's BackOffice accounting extensions.
6df764c29a2b4d2ad07a79f276bdb219.author: JPL TSolucio, S.L.

99feb8be761f247e27452872d6ef1173.name: General Ledger Account Groups
99feb8be761f247e27452872d6ef1173.description: General Ledger Account Groups module. This is part of the Attorney's BackOffice accounting extensions.
99feb8be761f247e27452872d6ef1173.author: JPL TSolucio, S.L.

614a2e56096fc56f9fc594148fabc801.name: General Ledger Types
614a2e56096fc56f9fc594148fabc801.description: General Ledger Types module. This is part of the Attorney's BackOffice accounting extensions.
614a2e56096fc56f9fc594148fabc801.author: JPL TSolucio, S.L.

409dfc2d618a73451385782336d067a4.name: Job Details Information
409dfc2d618a73451385782336d067a4.description: Job Details Information module. This is part of the Attorney's Back Office Human Resource enhancements.
409dfc2d618a73451385782336d067a4.author: JPL TSolucio, S.L.

85e78a70a708e832c9ad242ef0d4d429.name: Job Title Information
85e78a70a708e832c9ad242ef0d4d429.description: Job Title Information module. This is part of the Attorney's Back Office Human Resource enhancements.
85e78a70a708e832c9ad242ef0d4d429.author: JPL TSolucio, S.L.

cbf68031e542a83accf31f95414a701f.name: Juror
cbf68031e542a83accf31f95414a701f.description: Contact like module to register information about jurors. This is part of the Attorneys Back Office application.
cbf68031e542a83accf31f95414a701f.author: JPL TSolucio, S.L.

d28912af444fbf95902699e886b8f737.name: Just Log It
d28912af444fbf95902699e886b8f737.description: An Event/Calendar type module to register things that happen, incidents worth recording or simply time spent on some task.
d28912af444fbf95902699e886b8f737.author: JPL TSolucio, S.L.

5fe1d00050892c999ec83d42696fcdd9.name: Language Skill
5fe1d00050892c999ec83d42696fcdd9.description: Language Skills module to register information about the languages spoken by your employees and contacts. This is part of the Attorney's Back Office Human Resources extensions.
5fe1d00050892c999ec83d42696fcdd9.author: JPL TSolucio, S.L.

c8902de5299763b5c3cbce8d1f689811.name: Litigation Matter Details
c8902de5299763b5c3cbce8d1f689811.description: This project-like module permits defining the details of a litigation matter our business is working on. This is part of the Attorney's Back Office extensions.
c8902de5299763b5c3cbce8d1f689811.author: JPL TSolucio, S.L.

190e5194f9e3da5dd222ea030b5e24ab.name: Litigation Team Details
190e5194f9e3da5dd222ea030b5e24ab.description: This module permits defining the details and people working on a litigation. It is a very basic team management module. This is part of the Attorney's Back Office extensions.
190e5194f9e3da5dd222ea030b5e24ab.author: JPL TSolucio, S.L.

7c93c15be44afc24fcdaec7c3297d688.name: Litigation Team Functions
7c93c15be44afc24fcdaec7c3297d688.description: This module permits defining the function or responsibility of people working on a litigation. We can define the role each team member working on the matter has as they participate on different litigations. It is a part of the team management extensions of Attorney's Back Office.
7c93c15be44afc24fcdaec7c3297d688.author: JPL TSolucio, S.L.

23179fcf3bc723efd96e56860f886845.name: Managers
23179fcf3bc723efd96e56860f886845.description: Contact-like module to register information about management employees. This is part of the Attorney's Back Office Human Resources extensions.
23179fcf3bc723efd96e56860f886845.author: JPL TSolucio, S.L.

bb2869479a17a1239db56f71f03450e0.name: Mass Document Import
bb2869479a17a1239db56f71f03450e0.description: coreBOS extension that permits mass import of documents
bb2869479a17a1239db56f71f03450e0.author: JPL TSolucio, S.L.

b5111e7d1688faebe345382d816e075e.name: Inventory Modules Grouping and Converting
b5111e7d1688faebe345382d816e075e.description: This extension permits mass conversion of different inventory modules into other inventory modules with optional grouping on accounts and products. For example you will be able to convert a set of SalesOrders into Invoices or PurchaseOrders and vice versa. All six (6) inventory modules are supported in possible conversions.
b5111e7d1688faebe345382d816e075e.author: JPL TSolucio, S.L.

65c858cd42e870442505b878beb941f6.name: Occupation
65c858cd42e870442505b878beb941f6.description: Occupation module to register official SOC Code information types. This is part of the Attorney's Back Office Human Resources extensions.
65c858cd42e870442505b878beb941f6.author: JPL TSolucio, S.L.

8cfee5f5d7b45c4554b82f99cf0e0030.name: OnDemand User
8cfee5f5d7b45c4554b82f99cf0e0030.description: This extension modifies coreBOS to control the number of active users that are permitted to use the system. It was created to support On-Demand hosting services so you will be able to limit the users accessing the system and enforce per-user costs.
8cfee5f5d7b45c4554b82f99cf0e0030.author: JPL TSolucio, S.L.

2f5b9dcb5c3d886a1509124fc5c05bad.name: Opposing Attorneys Module
2f5b9dcb5c3d886a1509124fc5c05bad.description: Contact-like module to register information about the Opposing Attorneys we face in litigation matters. This is part of the Attorney's Back Office.
2f5b9dcb5c3d886a1509124fc5c05bad.author: JPL TSolucio, S.L.

a5a1d5d58e084c2d186559dcb15504bd.name: Opposing Party
a5a1d5d58e084c2d186559dcb15504bd.description: Contact-like module to register information about the Opposing Party we face in litigation matters. This is part of the Attorney's Back Office.
a5a1d5d58e084c2d186559dcb15504bd.author: JPL TSolucio, S.L.

f8dcecc78fe78e0b418622603a48ca28.name: Outsourcing
f8dcecc78fe78e0b418622603a48ca28.description: Contact-like module to register information about outsourced third party people or teams working on our projects. This is part of the Attorney's Back Office Human Resources extensions.
f8dcecc78fe78e0b418622603a48ca28.author: JPL TSolucio, S.L.

1cd7278356f763f8dfc008d8a4a04c9a.name: Paralegals
1cd7278356f763f8dfc008d8a4a04c9a.description: Contact-like module to register information about paralegal employees. This is part of the Attorney's Back Office Human Resources extensions.
1cd7278356f763f8dfc008d8a4a04c9a.author: JPL TSolucio, S.L.

9f2b3f21ff51c6d002c2960a0a6341e4.name: Pay Grades
9f2b3f21ff51c6d002c2960a0a6341e4.description: This module registers the different payment ranges our company works with and permits relating our staff with each one. This is part of the Attorney's Back Office Human Resources extensions.
9f2b3f21ff51c6d002c2960a0a6341e4.author: JPL TSolucio, S.L.

6aef159a3e85dd69113a0149a88b3ca8.name: Procurator
6aef159a3e85dd69113a0149a88b3ca8.description: Contact-like module to register information about procurators that work with our business. This is part of the Attorney's Back Office Human Resources extensions.
6aef159a3e85dd69113a0149a88b3ca8.author: JPL TSolucio, S.L.

22bf693e2e6768c2cd507dd7b2eb027b.name: Product Association
22bf693e2e6768c2cd507dd7b2eb027b.description: Product to product relation. Permits establishing a relation between products to indicate things like what date range a product is Required,Incompatible,Optional,Marketing,Obsolete,Substitute by another.
22bf693e2e6768c2cd507dd7b2eb027b.author: JPL TSolucio, S.L.

6137ea510b5d2e8e9270552db37a1495.name: Product Catalog
6137ea510b5d2e8e9270552db37a1495.description: Product to product relation. Permits establishing a relation between products to indicate things like what date range a product is Required,Standard,Optional,Selectable by another.
6137ea510b5d2e8e9270552db37a1495.author: JPL TSolucio, S.L.

7cb5acda2a4652920373a4f3c4f5c0b9.name: Programmed Emails
7cb5acda2a4652920373a4f3c4f5c0b9.description: Set of various modules that will permit you to create powerful email templates and send them out on determined schedule.
7cb5acda2a4652920373a4f3c4f5c0b9.author: JPL TSolucio, S.L.

f17ec10f5f9e9b5a17b8f7bae17d0417.name: Project Team
f17ec10f5f9e9b5a17b8f7bae17d0417.description: Module to relate project and contacts. It is similar to the Stake Holder module.
f17ec10f5f9e9b5a17b8f7bae17d0417.author: JPL TSolucio, S.L.

61447d2f5490fd70eeed1fa95a0ddf6e.name: Quality Actions
61447d2f5490fd70eeed1fa95a0ddf6e.description: This module is related with Quality Claims module and details the diferent actions or steps taken to resolve or attend the quality claim.
61447d2f5490fd70eeed1fa95a0ddf6e.author: JPL TSolucio, S.L.

414901aa79ca8a68ffcfad4da662d4ee.name: Quality Claims
414901aa79ca8a68ffcfad4da662d4ee.description: Module to control Quality Claims, used to enforce and document ISO standards. It should capture the details of the claim, who is attending it, the date references and the outcome. This module is related with Quality Actions module where each exact step is recorded.
414901aa79ca8a68ffcfad4da662d4ee.author: JPL TSolucio, S.L.

20ad723564ca3b4a710da84268677236.name: Register Backups
20ad723564ca3b4a710da84268677236.description: This module records all the backups that have been done. Necessary for inventory knowledge and legal requirements.
20ad723564ca3b4a710da84268677236.author: JPL TSolucio, S.L.

5a49190bde7baeebdc60cde9dc28f9b5.name: Research Request
5a49190bde7baeebdc60cde9dc28f9b5.description: Module to control research or investigation requests, used, for example, to document quote analysis requests or the study of possible solutions to problems that appear in the business. This module is related with Research Request Actions module where each exact step is recorded.
5a49190bde7baeebdc60cde9dc28f9b5.author: JPL TSolucio, S.L.

bc9024396093031d695ffca92cb7606a.name: Research Request Actions module
bc9024396093031d695ffca92cb7606a.description: This module is related with Research Request module and details the different actions or steps taken to resolve or attend the request.
bc9024396093031d695ffca92cb7606a.author: JPL TSolucio, S.L.

ee587c83a019ba29de815c2423646965.name: Retainer Contract
ee587c83a019ba29de815c2423646965.description: Contract-like module to register information about condtions of payment agreed upon for a work to be done. This is part of the Attorney's Back Office extensions, to control the retainments.
ee587c83a019ba29de815c2423646965.author: JPL TSolucio, S.L.

7ed05efcc6f8028355767a51a29b5176.name: Secretaries
7ed05efcc6f8028355767a51a29b5176.description: Contact-like module to register information about secretarial employees. This is part of the Attorney's Back Office Human Resources extensions.
7ed05efcc6f8028355767a51a29b5176.author: JPL TSolucio, S.L.

8769078e85a838dfcc9849bc391108ae.name: Skills and Talents Information
8769078e85a838dfcc9849bc391108ae.description: Skills information module to register information about the skills and talents of your employees and contacts. This is part of the Attorney's Back Office Human Resources extensions.
8769078e85a838dfcc9849bc391108ae.author: JPL TSolucio, S.L.

e25c523b20bef2e7f10df414c7e40e3b.name: Physical Support
e25c523b20bef2e7f10df414c7e40e3b.description: This asset-like module records all the external devices and support hardware being used by an account. Necessary for inventory knowledge and legal requirements.
e25c523b20bef2e7f10df414c7e40e3b.author: JPL TSolucio, S.L.

b91e394127d5545d628eee77ca5e7cbb.name: State Court
b91e394127d5545d628eee77ca5e7cbb.description: Module to record US State Courts
b91e394127d5545d628eee77ca5e7cbb.author: JPL TSolucio, S.L.

8dc61ff7eff19ef6665340e56b17b863.name: Segmentation Lists
8dc61ff7eff19ef6665340e56b17b863.description: Module to register the different groupings of our clients by different criteria in order to work with them in a segmented manner.
8dc61ff7eff19ef6665340e56b17b863.author: JPL TSolucio, S.L.

243ff2e55295c03a2a87483b94acb310.name: Support Personnel
243ff2e55295c03a2a87483b94acb310.description: Contact-like module to register information about eventual or third party workers that support your business. This is part of the Attorney's Back Office Human Resources extensions.
243ff2e55295c03a2a87483b94acb310.author: JPL TSolucio, S.L.

ef475eec5d5e1c6fb177290d5e25f638.name: Time/Resource Control
ef475eec5d5e1c6fb177290d5e25f638.description: This module adds time control to coreBOS. The idea is that you will be able to register in the system time slots spent on the majority of the entities in the application. So a sales person can register time spent on a lead, a technician can register time spent on a trouble ticket or administration can register time spent on an invoice.
ef475eec5d5e1c6fb177290d5e25f638.author: JPL TSolucio, S.L.

595031ae03ebf639d4452a8e83eddfa8.name: US Appeals Court Circuit Module
595031ae03ebf639d4452a8e83eddfa8.description: Information about courts we may work with. This is part of the Attorney's Back Office.
595031ae03ebf639d4452a8e83eddfa8.author: JPL TSolucio, S.L.

dbd4a75853a4cbd93c9fb668176a29a6.name: Users Working on Projects
dbd4a75853a4cbd93c9fb668176a29a6.description: This module permits relating users to different projects in the system. It is a very basic team management module. This is part of the Attorney's Back Office Human Resources extensions.
dbd4a75853a4cbd93c9fb668176a29a6.author: JPL TSolucio, S.L.

40ac9bb7f7d5afe9166ff0b23680328d.name: US Federal Districts
40ac9bb7f7d5afe9166ff0b23680328d.description: Module to record US Federal Districts
40ac9bb7f7d5afe9166ff0b23680328d.author: JPL TSolucio, S.L.

b7bf798db339ad55213ffc8e7a98672e.name: Document tree view
b7bf798db339ad55213ffc8e7a98672e.description: The main goal of the extension is to permit installations with a large number of documents to access a structured list view of the documents. By default the document list view shows a list of all folders with a set of documents it contains.
b7bf798db339ad55213ffc8e7a98672e.author: JPL TSolucio, S.L.

297f58a9d5af28955760f271c4bb649d.name: Multi Warehouse Enhancements
297f58a9d5af28955760f271c4bb649d.description: Perspective of three modules to manage multiwarehouse stock and movements of material between warehouses.
297f58a9d5af28955760f271c4bb649d.author: JPL TSolucio, S.L.

695672ccd9c12e50b57fe0fd30365117.name: Work Experience
695672ccd9c12e50b57fe0fd30365117.description: Work Experience module to register information about the employment history of your employees and contacts. This is part of the Attorney's Back Office Human Resources extensions.
695672ccd9c12e50b57fe0fd30365117.author: JPL TSolucio, S.L.

e611d87dc68d81df38d877103edca4d9.name: Work Schedule
e611d87dc68d81df38d877103edca4d9.description: Module to record the different weekly hours that we work in the office. This is part of the Attorney's Back Office extensions.
e611d87dc68d81df38d877103edca4d9.author: JPL TSolucio, S.L.
